DLG_MSG_BONUS_1: Watch an ad to get 1 extra life!
DLG_MSG_BONUS_1_INVITE: Invite your friends and get 1 Extra Life!
DLG_MSG_BONUS_2: Please come back tomorrow for more!
DLG_MSG_CON_ITEM: Consume an "Extra Life" for a higher score!
DLG_MSG_CON_AD_1: Watch a movie for an extra chance!
DLG_TIT_CON_RVS: Close to beat your friend's score!
DLG_MSG_CON_RVS: Watch an ad to beat your friends score!
DLG_MSG_CON_RVS_INVITE: Invite your friends and beat  your friends score!
DLG_MSG_CON_BST: Watch an ad to get your New Record!!
DLG_MSG_CON_BST_INVITE: Invite your friends and get your best score!
DLG_MSG_CON_ITEM_AND_AD: Watch ad and get a chance to score of 20!
SCR_TXT_INVITE_NO_FRIEND: If there are no friends on the list, press the "Other" button
DLG_MSG_BUYERR: An error occurred when purchasing the item. Please check your connection and try again.
DLG_MSG_COINERR: An error occurred when acquiring coins. Please check your internet connection and try again.
DLG_MSG_ADERR: An error occurred when loading ads. Please check your internet connection and try again.
DLG_MSG_FRQADERR: Redundant ads related error. Please wait and try again in a few minutes.
DLG_MSG_APVSERR: There was an error with the Messenger app. Make sure you have the latest version of the app.
DLG_MSG_NTWERR: There was an error with the request. Please check your internet connection and try again.
DLG_MSG_APIERR: An API-related error occurred. Please wait and try again in a few minutes.
DLG_MSG_STACMP_2: Hurry! <left_time> left before this unique offer ends!
CS_TXT_LVUP:
Lv. <levelnumber> reached!
Hit a few balls to let out some steam!
CS_TXT_HSCR:
Score <scorepoint> reached!
Join everyone else and bat your heart out!
CU_TXT_ENTPT: <Friend's Name> has joined all the Super Baseball fans!
CU_TXT_RSLT_HSCR: <playerName> just got a new high score of <score> in Super Baseball!
CU_TXT_RSLT: <playerName> just started Super Baseball with a slamming score of <score>!
CU_TXT_INVITE: You’ve been invited by <playerName> to play Super Baseball.
CU_TXT_CHALLENGE: You’ve been challenged by <playerName> in Super Baseball. Are you up to the challenge?
NO_NEED_7: <friend_name> is inviting you to a baseball match!
NO_NEED_9: <friend_name> has scored _l_points_r_! Can you do better?
NO_NEED_10: You have won against <friend_name>! Increase the gap with a higher score!
NO_NEED_11: You and <friend_name> are the greatest rivals of all times!
SCR_LBL_WEEKLY_HR_OVER: <number2> each achievement from over <number1> Home Runs
SCR_LBL_WEEKLY_HR_HIGHEST: Highest score of Weekly Home Runs
DLG_MSG_BOTOPTIN_A: Do you want to enjoy the story while playing the game?
DLG_MSG_BOTOPTIN_B: How was it? Don't you want to check the next story?
DLG_MSG_BOTOPTIN_C: Welcome back. Why don't you start your story?
DLG_MSG_BOTOPTIN_D: Are you having fun? If you advance the story, you can enjoy more.
DLG_MSG_BOTOPTIN_E: Would you like to get updates and keep in touch with your friends and games?
DLG_MSG_BOTOPTIN_CONFIRM: Would you like to turn on Messages from Super Baseball? We may send you story or valuable announcements. You can turn it off after if you don't want it.
DLG_MSG_BOTOPTIN_INCENTIVE: Turn on the message from Super Baseball
CU_TXT_WIN_BEAT_YOU:
I beat your score!
Can you beat this score?
CU_TXT_LOSE_NEXT_TIME: I will beat you next time. Be ready for it!
CU_TXT_DRAW_REMATCH:
We are not done yet!
Let's rematch!
CU_TXT_INVITE_WARMUP:
I started warming up.
How about you?
CS_TXT_WK_HR_REACH:
Weekly home run reached <weekly_homerun_number> !
Take a full swing at the ball with the bat?
CS_TXT_TTL_HR_REACH:
Total home run reached <total_homerun_number>!
Take a full swing at the ball with the bat?
CS_TXT_WLD_RANK_ACHV:
Ranked within<ranking_border>, achieved <rank_in_number> times!
How is your condition?
